summary: The module implements a conversion layer that translates Qiskit Pulse schedule objects and individual pulse instructions to the OpenPulse‑compatible Qobj format and vice versa, handling both standard and parametric pulse shapes as well as measurement and control directives.
business_intent: Allow quantum applications to compile and transmit custom pulse programs to hardware backends by providing reliable serialization and deserialization of pulse instructions between Qiskit’s internal representation and the OpenPulse Qobj specification.
